## RSE & Society
### Introduction

The RSE master's programme introduces students to cutting-edge technologies that may also raise ethical questions. To talk about the impact of RSE on society, is therefore crucial.

### Contents
Possible topics are:

- responsibility of (research) software engineers
- RSE and Open Science
- dual use dilemma
- ethics and AI
- sustainability and green technology
- future of work
- gender inequalities

### General Competences
This module conveys competences in areas such as but not limited to ...

- discussion of ethical questions
- awareness of societal consequences
